dev.commit_message: Fixed issue when including doctest remotely (#762)
removed discord badge - will delete the server - GitHub issues & discussions are enough
fixed links
version 2.4.11
removed the generated html docs - doubt anyone is using them
fixed #751 which was caused by commit db758e02 when turning the values from an enum to an integer implicitly
fixed issue #755 - FAIL/FAIL_CHECK weren't properly reported with the junit reporter
test gcc 12

* Only make changes for clang

* Add dwarf info to CMakeLists.txt

Use variables instead of hard-coded `mpirun` `-np` (#689)

CMake's `FindMPI` module sets `MPIEXEC_EXECUTABLE` and `MPIEXEC_NUMPROC_FLAG`. We use them so it works for different MPI implementations.

example would fail in the generation phase.

Use variables instead of hard-coded `mpirun` `-np` (#689)

CMake's `FindMPI` module sets `MPIEXEC_EXECUTABLE` and `MPIEXEC_NUMPROC_FLAG`. We use them so it works for different MPI implementations.

Fix CMake example in docs (#692)

Name of target is different from the name of executable. Therefore this
example would fail in the generation phase.
